fields.description:
I am unable to delete a CloudFormation stack both from the Console and the CLI. I created it using the *Basic Plus VPC.json* template in 4.2.2 a few months back.  I was hoping the upgrade to 4.3.0.1 would resolve the issue, but the same issue occurs even after the upgrade.

Here is the {{cloud-output.log}} information on the UFS node when trying to delete the stack:

fields.summary: Unable to remove cloudformation stack due to null pointer exception

comments.body: I have verified that removing attributes will cause a NullPointer exception, as attribute values are saved and attempted to be repopulated on delete.  Removing attributes can also cause stacks that had worked previously to fail if they contain a reference to the attribute with a Fn::GetAtt call.  We could, during delete, ignore attribute setting failures, which would help in this specific situation, but if there is a reference to the attribute in the template, it would still fail to delete.

git branch dev-ethomas-EUCA-12781
git show a26e9eca0ac8b7a49314e8c0ac3be852ac25fde5

Checks that an attribute name exists before calling .setAttribute(), logs a warning and ignores the request otherwise.  Also doesn't persist null values to the db.
[~ethomas], the fix looks good to me.

Fix Verified.

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.4.0
Release     : 0.25777.142.20170130git8ef69c1.el7

Verified using the db surgery method of adding a phantom attribute. After the db manipulation the stack could be deleted and no errors observed in the logs. (note, in the comment with the db update sql statement there is a slight error in the escaping of the json. \"PhantomValue\" should be "\"PhantomValue\"". You will see the correct statement in the verification output.)
{code}
[root@c-07 ~]# euform-describe-stacks
STACK	euca-12781-stack3	CREATE_COMPLETE		Security Group Test => MVP for AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup, AWS::EC2::SecurityGroupIngress, and AWS::EC2::SecurityGroupEgress	2017-01-31T21:28:58.911Z
OUTPUT	VPCId	vpc-21b79dc2
OUTPUT	VPCCidrBlock	10.0.0.0/16
OUTPUT	SecurityGroupRefId	sg-8f49559a
OUTPUT	SecurityGroupEgressId	euca-12781-stack3-SecurityGroupEgress-LXNGKMT0CSCOE
OUTPUT	SecurityGroupIngress22Id	SecurityGroupIngress22
OUTPUT	SecurityGroupIngress443Id	SecurityGroupIngress443
OUTPUT	SecurityGroupId	sg-8f49559a

[root@c-07 ~]# psql -p 8777 -h ${EUCALYPTUS}/var/lib/eucalyptus/db/data eucalyptus_shared
psql (9.2.18)
Type "help" for help.

eucalyptus_shared=# SET search_path TO eucalyptus_cloudformation;
SET

eucalyptus_shared=# update stack_resources set resource_attributes_json = '{"GroupId":"\"sg-8f49559a\"","PhantomAttribute":"\"PhantomValue\""}' where resource_attributes_json = '{"GroupId":"\"sg-8f49559a\""}';
UPDATE 1

eucalyptus_shared=# \q


[root@c-07 ~]# euform-delete-stack euca-12781-stack3
{code}
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
